description.en:
1. In order for a number of MacroDroid features to work on devices running Android 10+, a new helper app is now required. This helper app is built against an older target SDK allowing it to still invoke the functionalities.
2. For devices running Android 14+, be sure to read the WHOLE POST: https://www.macrodroidforum.com/index.php?threads/macrodroid-helper-apk.1/
